concept.title: Building Events
concept.shortdesc: The ArtBlok sponsors and organizes several events in the building.

conbody.p:
The events include:
Art a Whirl
Cabal Immersive Theater Performances by Looking Glass Theater Troupe
First Friday Open Studios
Glass Blowing Workshops at FOCI
Maker Faires
Northeast Minneapolis Artist Association health benefits workshops
November Holiday Sale
